# JwtInspector class

Provides methods for inspecting and extracting parameters from JWT tokens.

```csharp
public static class JwtInspector
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [ReadAllParameters](JwtInspector/ReadAllParameters)(…) | Reads out every header field, standard property, and claim from a compact JWT. |
